settings.text: SOLVES THE ROOT CAUSE OF YOUR BREATHING PROBLEMS

settings.question: Where’s the Scientific Proof?
settings.answer:
ErgonLungs Breathing Trainer leverages cutting-edge respiratory muscle training (RMT) methods that are grounded in scientific evidence. Numerous controlled studies have shown that RMT can significantly enhance lung function and overall respiratory performance. Supporting peer-reviewed research includes:


J Phys Ther Sci. 2012 May.


Taylor S. Thurston. 2016 March 4.


Jennifer R. Vranish, E. Fiona Bailey. 2017 Jun 5.

settings.question: How Soon Will I Notice a Difference?
settings.answer: Many users report noticeable improvements within just a few days of using the ErgonLungs Breathing Trainer. The more consistently you use it, the greater and faster your results will be.

settings.question: How Do I Use ErgonLungs?
settings.answer:
Step 1: Get Ready

Before starting, make sure your ErgonLungs Breathing Trainer is clean. Insert the mouthpiece into your mouth with the word "TOP" facing up. Gently bite down on the sides of the mouthpiece to hold it securely in place.

Step 2: Breathe with Intention

Stand or sit upright with good posture—or incorporate it into your workout. Adjust the resistance dial to a challenging (but not uncomfortable) level. Inhale deeply through the mouthpiece until your lungs are full, then exhale through it until you're almost out of breath. Focus on expanding your lungs fully—this activates your inspiratory muscles.

Step 3: Recover and Repeat

Remove the trainer and breathe normally until you recover. Repeat the full breathing cycle 10 times to complete one set. Aim for 2 to 4 sets per day, ideally before meals for best results.

Every ErgonLungs Breathing Trainer includes a free in-depth eBook to help you master the technique, maximize your performance, and understand the science behind it.

Be sure to read the full guide and disclaimers before your first use.

settings.question: What If It Doesn’t Work for Me?
settings.answer:
We stand behind ErgonLungs with complete confidence. Thousands have already experienced noticeable, life-changing results—and we believe you will too. But if for any reason you’re not fully satisfied, we’ve got you covered.

ErgonLungs comes with a 30-day, no-questions-asked, 100% money-back guarantee. If it’s not the best decision you’ve made for your breathing and well-being—or if you simply change your mind—just email us. Our friendly support team is always ready to help you with a quick and hassle-free refund.

settings.question: What about mouth breathing?
settings.answer:
ErgonLungs is intended for short-term use, typically between five to thirty minutes a day, to prevent promoting mouth breathing.

When focusing on respiratory and muscular training, it is designed for oral use, as this provides a larger airway for increased air intake. This limited usage ensures that the remaining 23 hours of the day can be spent breathing naturally through the nose.

Using the mouth with ErgonLungs optimizes respiratory muscle development and function, enhancing air movement in and out of the body. This approach aids in building muscle and flexibility, ultimately improving your ability to breathe effectively through your nose. With ErgonLungs, you can achieve a balanced development of strength and flexibility in your respiratory muscles.

settings.question: Will it enhance my lung volume?
settings.answer: The ErgonLungs breathing trainer does not increase lung volume, as each person is born with a fixed lung capacity that cannot be changed. However, the breathwork it provides helps train your breathing, making it easier to expand the chest area and improving overall breathing efficiency.

settings.question: How does it help clear blocked airways?
settings.answer: The ErgonLungs breathing trainer employs airflow resistance training, utilizing breathwork with the device to create pressure that aids in expelling mucus that may be trapped due to smoking or vaping. For optimal results, we suggest using the breathing trainer consistently for two weeks. If you do not cough up any mucus, it is likely that there is no mucus accumulation present.

settings.question: How long does it take to notice results with ErgonLungs?
settings.answer: Results can differ from individual to individual, but numerous users have reported experiencing benefits within a few weeks of consistent use. Maintaining regularity is essential for achieving optimal results..
